attributes.additional_details:
Mike Kenny is Britain's greatest ever Paralympian - 16 gold medals in swimming yet hasn't been recognised with any honour.  If able bodied athletes get knighthoods for 6, why hasn't Kenny?

Kenny's details - http://www.paralympiansclub.org.uk/athlete.asp?itemid=50&itemTitle=Mike+Kenny&section=70&sectionTitle=Search+For+An+Athlete&games=&sport=&medal_gold=&medal_silver=&medal_bronze=&keyword=mike%20kenny
